item.title: Deploy any machine learning model serverless in AWS
item.author: ritchie46@gmail.com (Ritchie Vink)
item.description: When a machine learning model goes into production, it is very likely to be idle most of the time. There are a lot of use cases, where a model only needs to run inference when new data is available. If we do have such a use case and we deploy a model on a server, it will eagerly be checking for new data, only to be disappointed for most of its lifetime and meanwhile you pay for the live time of the server.
